content.description: Consider the following method, which is intended to return the number of strings of length greater than or equal to 3 in an array of String objects.
content.question: public static int checkString(String[] arr){int count = 0;for (int k = 0; k < arr.length; k++){if (arr[k].length() >= 3){count++;}}return count;}Which of the following code segments compile without error?checkString(new String[]);checkString(new String[0]);String[] str = {"cat", "dog"};checkString(str);

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
